volumeInfo.subtitle: Build Android Apps to Capture, Manipulate, and Track Objects in 2D and 3D
volumeInfo.description: A step-by-step tutorial to help you master computer vision and mobile app development.This book is for Java developers who are new to computer vision and who would like to learn about how it is used in relation to application development. It is assumed that you have previous experience in Java, but not necessarily Android. A basic understanding of image data (for example pixels and color channels) would be helpful too. You are expected to have a mobile device running Android 2.2 (Froyo) or greater and it must have a camera
volumeInfo.title: Android Application Programming with OpenCV

searchInfo.textSnippet: A step-by-step tutorial to help you master computer vision and mobile app development.This book is for Java developers who are new to computer vision and who would like to learn about how it is used in relation to application development.
